member.name: CombineMode
member.summary: The CombineMode enumeration specifies how a new region is combined with an existing region.

member.name: CombineMode.CombineModeReplace
member.summary: Specifies that the existing region is replaced by the new region.

member.name: CombineMode.CombineModeIntersect
member.summary: Specifies that the existing region is replaced by the intersection of itself and the new region.

member.name: CombineMode.CombineModeUnion
member.summary: Specifies that the existing region is replaced by the union of itself and the new region.

member.name: CombineMode.CombineModeXor
member.summary: Specifies that the existing region is replaced by the result of performing anXOR on the two regions. A point is in theXOR of two regions if it is in one region or the other but not in both regions.

member.name: CombineMode.CombineModeExclude
member.summary: Specifies that the existing region is replaced by the portion of itself that is outside of the new region.

member.name: CombineMode.CombineModeComplement
member.summary: Specifies that the existing region is replaced by the portion of the new region that is outside of the existing region.
